Author: elasmar
Title: ▄▀▄▀▄▀▄ [ANN][ICO][GZB] ★ GIGZI ★ Independent Wealth Management ▄▀▄▀▄▀▄
Body: Thank you for noticing that. We have been working hard to ensure timely delivery of our solution to the market  Quote from: Andreinethab on October 11, 2018, 09:44:37 AM your idea seems to me to be a true profitable option for early investors. I see development activity in the period before the sale of tokens. Have you attracted your investment capital for the initial product development? Appreciate your insight. We have invested everything ourselves so far and have now reached the stage where we are seeking investment. If anyone is interested in private sale, contact us directly   Quote from: Vasyafet on October 11, 2018, 09:48:48 AM Hello. I like your idea of protecting users from the unpredictability of market fluctuations. This will be a successful participation. What is the minimum contribution for your project? We want to make it accessible for all. We have no minimum and no maximum limitations imposed on the crowdsale  Quote from: Mix_Fix on October 11, 2018, 01:35:50 PM Will testing your apps be available to the community during the token sales period? Can we see your MVP? We weren't planning on this. But we will definitely consider it going forward. Thank you for the thought  Quote from: Arcurislahalyn on October 11, 2018, 01:40:39 PM What is the increase in the value of the Gigzi black token you plan to get in the first year after your system starts? Is there a specific strategy to increase user interest in your products? Our plan is provide users with products they can actually use and benefit from on a regular basis. These will lead to increased adoption of Gigzi Black users.  Few examples: 1. a multi-currency wallet application secured with iris recognition technology is something many can use even without having to invest in Gigzi crypto-assets. It will support major cryptocurrencies like ETH and BTC. By making the Gigzi Wallet application inter-operable, there will be more chance that users will be drawn to trade Gigzi Black as it has many unique features.  2. Gigzi Metal, stable metal backed crypto-assets can be used to hedge against the volatility risk of any cryptocurrency including Gigzi Black. It allows traders to ride the bull runs then instantly convert to Gigzi Metal for the protection of those profits. Creating a safe-haven for user funds whilst still in the crypto space. One of the benefits for trading on Gigzi Black is that users earn Gold Rewards!  3. Making precious metals accessible for all users worldwide. Anyone can now anonymously own precious metals and have them secure using their iris. Another unique feature is the next of kin, which allows secondary users iris to be registered on the same account. Giving peace of mind that should the worst happen the stored wealth can still be accessible by a trusted friend or family member.  Everything we are creating is designed for the benefit of the user. If the user finds our solution safe, convenient and efficient to manage their wealth and be rewarded while doing it, then we have done our part  Quote from: Dorbaraco on October 11, 2018, 01:45:32 PM I'm Interested in your products. Now I want to understand the use of the gold card in the private Gigzi network. What will be available to me on your network? A debit card that can be loaded directly from the wallet. It is not a Visa or Mastercard. Loading and spending is being done with Gigzi Gold. No conversions, no high fees, no transfers. Just load the card and tap to make payments as you usually would  Quote from: Chatelleyma on October 11, 2018, 01:52:02 PM 60% of all transaction fees are paid to Gigzi Gold users. Will this payout be permanent for users or is there a limited period in which this opportunity will be available? Permanent, it is coded into the smart contract. Gold Rewards are paid out automatically every 90 days  Quote from: orchideja75 on October 11, 2018, 01:55:57 PM Quote from: PchelkaMaja95 on October 11, 2018, 01:42:31 PM Quote from: Arcurislahalyn on October 11, 2018, 01:40:39 PM What is the increase in the value of the Gigzi black token you plan to get in the first year after your system starts? Is there a specific strategy to increase user interest in your products? I think that no one knows this and everything will depend on how the community perceives the project and what the demand for tokens will be after exiting the exchanges. You're partially right. I think that the interest to the project will become clear already at the time of selling tokens. I think that a small number of tokens available for sale will increase interest. Yes, the reason is exactly that. We want to protect the value of the Gigzi Black and have it increase slowly along with the performance of the economy. This is all handled by smart contract, protecting users and the wealth invested in the system

Title: ▄▀▄▀▄▀▄ [ANN][ICO][GZB] ★ GIGZI ★ Independent Wealth Management ▄▀▄▀▄▀▄
Body: Thanks for the interest. Really good question, Gigzi Black fluctuates just like any other cryptocurrency, by market demand and speculation. However what makes Gigzi Black unique is the rewards feature which is coded in the smart contract, whereby 60% of all transaction fees are paid out to users in Gigzi Gold. Gigzi Gold is the crypto-asset backed by gold. For holding Gigzi Black, you are in a way taking a risk because the value fluctuates, for that you are rewarded in gold

Author: elasmar
Title: ▄▀▄▀▄▀▄ [ANN][ICO][GZB] ★ GIGZI ★ Independent Wealth Management ▄▀▄▀▄▀▄
Body: Appreciate the support! Our smart contract has been completed, audited and deployed. It is the biggest part as it regulates the entire system. The 'Gigzi Iris' biometric security device prototype has successfully passed tests conducted by large institutes and governments, the same algorithm is being used in the biometric chip passports which allow you to enter by scanning at immigration. Wallet, Treasury and Exchange applications are under development. Realistically we are only a few months away from launching our full range of products and services
